item.title: By: Henk
item.dc:creator: Henk
item.description: Thanks for this very interesting blog post. What I\'ve learned is that we have set back the clock to let\'s say the mid \'80\'s when it became clear that not a single line -, not a single character in code can be assumed safe and correct. We will have to install military - and space-proof mechanisms to audit and test contracts.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for this very interesting blog post. What I\’ve learned is that we have set back the clock to let\’s say the mid \’80\’s when it became clear that not a single line -, not a single character in code can be assumed safe and correct. We will have to install military – and space-proof mechanisms to audit and test contracts.
